verses.verse: And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H559>determined<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and a <S%H1004>house<s%> for his <S%H4438>kingdom.<s%>

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> told <S%H5608>out<s%> threescore and <S%H7657>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> to bear <S%H5449>burdens,<s%> and <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376><s%> to <S%H2672>hew<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> to <S%H5329>oversee<s%> <S%H5921><s%> them.

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H2361>Huram<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H834>As<s%> thou didst <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> and didst <S%H7971>send<s%> him <S%H730>cedars<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> him a <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein, even so deal with me.

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> to the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H6942>dedicate<s%> it to him, and to <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense,<s%> and for the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H4635>shewbread,<s%> and for the burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> <S%H1242>morning<s%> and <S%H6153>evening,<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbaths,<s%> and on the new <S%H2320>moons,<s%> and on the solemn <S%H4150>feasts<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> is an ordinance <S%H5769>forever<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H1129>build<s%> is <S%H1419>great:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> is our <S%H430>God<s%> above <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H430>gods.<s%>

But <S%H4310>who<s%> is <S%H6113>able<s%> <S%H3581><s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> him a <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3588>seeing<s%> the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H8064>heaven<s%> of <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3557>contain<s%> him? <S%H4310>who<s%> am <S%H589>I<s%> then, <S%H834>that<s%> I should <S%H1129>build<s%> him a <S%H1004>house,<s%> save <S%H3588>only<s%> <S%H518><s%> to burn <S%H6999>sacrifice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him?

Send <S%H7971><s%> me <S%H6258>now<s%> therefore a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2450>cunning<s%> to <S%H6213>work<s%> in <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and in <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and in <S%H5178>brass,<s%> and in <S%H1270>iron,<s%> and in <S%H710>purple,<s%> and <S%H3758>crimson,<s%> and <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and that can <S%H3045>skill<s%> to <S%H6605>grave<s%> <S%H6603><s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the cunning <S%H2450>men<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are <S%H5973>with<s%> me in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> did <S%H3559>provide.<s%>

Send <S%H7971><s%> me also <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>trees,<s%> fir <S%H1265>trees,<s%> and algum <S%H418>trees,<s%> out of <S%H4480>Lebanon:<s%> <S%H3844><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> can <S%H3045>skill<s%> to <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H6086>timber<s%> in <S%H3844>Lebanon;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> my <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall be <S%H5973>with<s%> thy <S%H5650>servants,<s%>

Even to <S%H3559>prepare<s%> me <S%H6086>timber<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am about to <S%H1129>build<s%> shall be <S%H6381>wonderful<s%> <S%H1419>great.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> to thy <S%H5650>servants,<s%> the <S%H2404>hewers<s%> that <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H6086>timber,<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H3734>measures<s%> of <S%H4347>beaten<s%> <S%H2406>wheat,<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H3734>measures<s%> of <S%H8184>barley,<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1324>baths<s%> of <S%H3196>wine,<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1324>baths<s%> of <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

Then <S%H2361>Huram<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%> in <S%H3791>writing,<s%> which he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> Because the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H160>loved<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> he hath <S%H5414>made<s%> thee <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them.

Huram <S%H2361><s%> <S%H559>said<s%> moreover, <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3045>endued<s%> with <S%H7922>prudence<s%> and <S%H998>understanding,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> might <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and a <S%H1004>house<s%> for his <S%H4438>kingdom.<s%>
And <S%H6258>now<s%> I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> a <S%H2450>cunning<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H3045>endued<s%> with <S%H998>understanding,<s%> of <S%H2361>Huram<s%> my <S%H1>father's,<s%>

The <S%H1121>son<s%> of a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> and his <S%H1>father<s%> was a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H6876>Tyre,<s%> <S%H3045>skillful<s%> to <S%H6213>work<s%> in <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and in <S%H3701>silver,<s%> in <S%H5178>brass,<s%> in <S%H1270>iron,<s%> in <S%H68>stone,<s%> and in <S%H6086>timber,<s%> in <S%H713>purple,<s%> in <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and in fine <S%H948>linen,<s%> and in <S%H3758>crimson;<s%> also to <S%H6605>grave<s%> any <S%H3605>manner<s%> of <S%H6603>graving,<s%> and to find <S%H2803>out<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4284>device<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> shall be <S%H5414>put<s%> to him, <S%H5973>with<s%> thy cunning <S%H2450>men,<s%> and with the cunning <S%H2450>men<s%> of my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> thy <S%H1>father.<s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore the <S%H2406>wheat,<s%> and the <S%H8184>barley,<s%> the <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and the <S%H3196>wine,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> hath <S%H559>spoken<s%> of, let him <S%H7971>send<s%> unto his servants: <S%H5650><s%>

And <S%H587>we<s%> will <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> as much as <S%H3605>thou<s%> shalt <S%H6878>need:<s%> and we will <S%H935>bring<s%> it to thee in <S%H7513>floats<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> to <S%H3305>Joppa;<s%> and <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt carry it <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5608>numbered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>strangers<s%> <S%H1616><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H5610>numbering<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> had <S%H5608>numbered<s%> them; and they were <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>set<s%> threescore and <S%H7657>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them to be bearers of <S%H5449>burdens,<s%> and <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> to be <S%H2672>hewers<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H5329>overseers<s%> to <S%H5647>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> a work.
